channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET NOD32 Antivirus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET NOD32 Antivirus

item.title: CVE-2023-5594|2023-12-21T11:30:41.256Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Improper validation of the server’s certificate chain in secure traffic scanning feature considered intermediate certificate signed using the MD5 or SHA1 algorithm as trusted.

item.title: CVE-2023-3160|2023-08-14T09:27:02.427Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: The vulnerability potentially allows an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations during the module update to delete or move files without having proper permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-0353|2024-02-15T07:40:24.786Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability potentially allowed an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations to delete files without having proper permission.
